line_1: Lord Mandevil was now the only Theam,
line_2: Their daily Pleasure, and their nightly Dream;

line_1: My Song while William is my Theam,
line_2: Now seated by a lovely Stream,

line_1: And fly their towring Wit at some Caelestial Theam:
line_2: Time was when Pious Bards might safely Dream

line_1: And fly their towring Wit at some Caelestial Theam:
line_2: By Helicon, or fair Pirene's Stream;

line_1: Or could I hope my Verse might reach my Theam;
line_2: Had this poor Breast receiv'd the Heav'nly Beam;
Thy Fancy need but dart a Beam
